content: designed by juan the yarn addict suggested materials premier basix worsted weight yarn hook 6mm us j approx 2500-3000 yards quantity will vary depending on your gauge and hook size used abbreviations/meanings chain chain double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet skip skip sl slip space space st s stitch/stitches week 6 round 51 front insert a standing double_crochet in any corner counts as a st 1 double_crochet in corner space skip 2 sts and place 2 double_crochet in the space in between sts 2 and 3 skip 2 sts and place 2 double_crochet in the space in between sts 2 and 3 continue this repeat until you have 2 sts left before the corner in the corner 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet repeat on the remaining three sides in the last corner 2 double_crochet then perform a half_double_crochet join to the standing double_crochet to close the round 174 sts per side round 52 back chain 1 does not count as a st and turn your work 2 single_crochet in corner space chain 1 skip over to space in between the pairs of double_crochet and place 1 single_crochet chain 1 skip to the next space and place 1 single_crochet chain 1 continue placing 1 single_crochet chain 1 in each space until the corner in the corner 2 single_crochet chain 2 2 single_crochet repeat for the remaining 3 sides in the last corner 2 single_crochet then perform a half_double_crochet join to the 1st single_crochet to close the round 90 single_crochet 87 chain 1 space per side round 53 front chain 2 counts as a st and turn work 1 single_crochet in the corner space chain 3 skip 2 sts and in the chain 1 space place 1 single_crochet chain 3 1 single_crochet chain 3 skip to next chain 1 space and place 1 single_crochet chain 3 2 single_crochet continue this repeat until you have 2 sts left before the corner chain 3 then in the corner 2 single_crochet chain 3 2 single_crochet repeat for the 3 remaining sides in the last corner 2 single_crochet chain 3 and slip_stitch into the top of the chain 2 to close the round tie off and cut yarn 87 sets of 1 single_crochet chain 3 1 single_crochet and 4 single_crochet in corners per side this concludes the wildflower oasis spring cal copyright notice video tutorial available on youtube copyright © 2025 by juan the yarn addict jtya @juantheyarnaddict designs llc all rights reserved this pattern is for
